111.content:
You are...rather you were Tabitha,an 8 year old girl,the youngest of three children in a loving familly living in Toronto.You and your family were taking a plane to fly to Vancouver to visit familly for the Holidays.You were scared of flying,but your big brother distracted you by letting you read his manga with him.
Unfortunatly,a big storm caused violent turbulences which caused the plane to fall down.You cried as the plane fell fast.As it crashed,everything went dark.You didn't feel pain anymore...until a voice speaks to you.
"It was too early for you to die,but we had no control over this situation."said to voice.You opened your eyes,only to find yourself,,in a space-like limbo.
"Tabitha,we can offer you another chance to live,under a new form,and new name in...
111.title: girl

1113.content: "Howrever...you will live in a new world,one which is concidered fiction in your former world." he added.
1113.title: a fictional world

111331.content: Which character will you now live as?
111331.title: Naruto

1113312.content: Perharps Sasuke Uchiha,Naruto's friend and rival?
1113312.title: More choices?

11133121.content:
"I have chosen a new form,in this new world.By becoming him,perharps you will not be teinted by hatred,I will leave some of the memories of your former life as Tabitha Thompson in your reincarnation,Fairwell my child and live a new peaceful life."
Light surounded you before everything went dark onces again.

When you opened your eyes,you stared at a sealing."What it all a dream?" You asked yourself.You got up from the bed you were now on and looked around,before noticing that you were abit taller."Whose room is this?" you asked yourself,only to notice that your voice was deeper...male sounding."Have I reincarnated into a boy..and an older one too?" You noticed a mirror nearby and looked at your new reflection.Spiky black hair with shoulder length black bangs,cool onyx eyes...you could regonise that character from your brother's favorite manga,Naruto.What was his name again? "Sasuke...I've become Sasuke!You had reincarnated into a 12 year old Sasuke Uchiha." You were both lost and confused.A knock was heard on the door.You decided to open the door to see who it was.
11133121.title: Yes

111331212.content:
A familiar blond haired boy,with whisker-like marks on his cheeks,clad in orange and wearing the same headband you were now wearing stared at you."About time Sasuke,you teme!" he shouted,looking angry."Sakura told me to come get you,because she was worried!" he shouted."That loud boy.He must be Naruto." you thought.Naruto noticed the confusion in Sasuke's face,now your face."Why are you making that face?" he said.You quickly turned back to a cool expresion."It's nothing....dobe." you said.You called him dobe.It came just like that.You really did become him,body and soul.You now had access to his memories and powers.But like the voice said before,you still kept the memories and personality of your previous life.
"Hey Sasuke! Come on! Let's go! Sakura and Kakashi sensei are waiting for us!"
You nodded,and followed your new comrade to Team 7's training grounds.
111331212.title: Naruto Uzumaki

12321221.content:
You freak out, your mind is a blur.
You start running from your brother's room while screaming desperately.
But then your brother catch you and say that you have nothing to fear, strangely when he says that you feel secure in your brother's arms as always you do when you are scared of the darkness.
The he says that you must wait until mom and dad get home to explain you what happened and you agree with him.

When your parents get home they explain that your family is not normal, they say that you and all of your family are vampires and that at your brother's age is when you start feeling the need for blood.

They get you to understand what's goin to happen to you when you get older and that what your brother was doing is absolutely normal.
A few years passed and you finally get to o the day that you feel that you need to suck blood from others.

When you think of it, you have two options, tell your brother's girlfriend that if she can help you or go with Amy, your best friend and the only friend you have that knows your secret and ask her if she can help you.

15.title: Other human

151.content:
2 years ago my beloved father died and I never could scope with this. I was so close to him, closer than my older brother and sometimes I felt, that I was even closer to him as my own mother, his wife.
He was suffering from cancer for 10 years, sometimes more sometimes less, but never showed any weakness, always fighting and taking any possible chance he could get, like medication and so on, he had 4 chemo therapies over the years, but the last one did not show much success and after having his 60 birthday, where he invited all family and friends, neighbors etc., he decided to stop fighting and gave up, the first time I saw him giving up. Some weeks later he died. They told that he was falling asleep easily in the hospital, but I am sure this is not true…
But his dead was the moment when I also started to give up….
151.title: of deep sadness

151221.title: kill myself

1512211.content:
Suddenly I found myself into nothing but pure darkness.
This is what dead is I thought, but why I still was thinking, so I still must exist, kind of.
I started to fear as I heard a loud voice: ”Mathew; I am reading your file and check your life: I think to kill yourself is not an option I will allow you to escape. This is too easy. I understand your sadness about the loss of your beloved father, but so far I am reading your file, you were pretty much not caring about him or anything in your younger years! Taking drugs, screwing girls, being the total macho! Also your last sentence as a living one, made me think….I think you should go back to the living ones, but indeed as a female!”
“What no, please don’t do this to me?” I protested.
“Your protest comes much too late, the decision has been taken. I might even ask my supervisor if we should not erase your memory…”
“No please don’t delete me” I said. This sounded like I would be permanently gone and this was even worse.
“Ok; I will talk to my boss” the voice said and I am trapped in total darkness and silence. This must be hell…
After what felt like an eternity the voice comes back: ”We have a solution, which might also be interesting for you: Listen to what I will tell you now fully, don’t interrupt! I will tell this only once:
“You will send back to earth as a woman. We actually half your age, so you will be 16….
You will also go back 16 years in time, so your father will be still alive and you even will have the opportunity to get close to him again.
You will be Stella, a girl from your brother class; he has a crush on you. Your brother is also the same age now and a single child. So we kind of erased you from your family, but you supposed to become your brother’s girlfriend…
Some more basic rules to avoid troubles…
1512211.title: I was reborn as a woman

15122111.content: I was about to interrupt, but then I didn’t do it, considering that this might end up in even more trouble…
15122111.title: listen to the rules

choices: ask some final questions, now or never

1) No talking about your old life, we will erase memory immediately, if we find out that you even try to talk to someone
2) you don’t need to go through whole life of Stella, we put you into teenage years. If you are in trouble at some point we will help you
3) we will give you the choice to continue your new life as Stella or return to your old life or even final death. This offer we give you regular, after 1 month for the first time, then after our decision, but at least once a year
1512211111.title: listen to the rules
